backend/main.mo: Motoko actor handling user registration, login, session creation, and profile initialization with access control and in-memory stores for credentials and sessions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a frontend update to map backend registration errors to friendly messages with related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten set of summaries for multiple frontend files covering app structure, state providers, navigation, queries, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light/dark theme CSS variables and applying base styles across the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React application and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication flow, profile setup, layout providers, and global connection banner.
frontend/src/auth/authMessages.ts: Centralized authentication messages and a function mapping backend registration errors to user-facing text.
frontend/src/auth/AuthProvider.tsx: Authentication context managing session restoration, login, registration, logout, and backend session validation.
frontend/src/auth/sessionStorage.ts: Utility for saving, loading, and clearing auth session data in localStorage with expiration handling and type normalization.
frontend/src/auth/useAuth.ts: Exports a hook that returns authentication context values.
Layout component that renders a styled authentication page wrapper with logo, title, description, and children.
frontend/src/components/channels/Categor: Renders a category section with channel lists, drag-and-drop reordering, and channel creation controls tied to server ordering.
frontend/src/components/channels/CreateC: Dialog for creating a new category with validation, backend-guard checks, and mutation error handling.
Dialog for creating text or voice channels within a category, supporting type selection and guarded backend actions.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Message input component that sends text channel messages with backend validation and UI controls.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatView.ts: Displays channel messages, handles auto-scrolling, and shows a composer for sending new messages.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageItem: Renders an individual chat message with avatar, username, timestamp, and click-to-view-profile behavior.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Discov: Displays a searchable list of community servers and allows joining them.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Server: Shows a server preview card with name, description, member count, and a join button.
frontend/src/components/dms/DMHomeView.t: Shows the DM home view or friends view, and a placeholder when no DMs exist.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendRo: Displays a friend entry with avatar, status, and actions like message, call, or menu options.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsH: Provides tabs for managing friends, requests, blocks, and adding friends.
frontend/src/components/layout/DesktopSh: Defines the desktop layout with server rail, channel sidebar, main content, and optional member list.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainConte: Chooses which major view to display based on navigation state such as DMs, server channels, or settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileShe: Implements the mobile layout using slide-out sheets for servers, channels, and members.
frontend/src/components/layout/Responsiv: Switches between mobile and desktop shells based on window size.
frontend/src/components/members/MemberLi: Lists server members with avatars and lets the user select a member for more details.
frontend/src/components/nav/ChannelSideb: Renders the server's channel sidebar, handles category expansion, drag-and-drop reordering, and category creation dialog.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileTopBar: Provides a mobile top navigation bar with server, channel, member, and settings actions.
frontend/src/components/nav/ServerRail.t: Displays the vertical server list rail, including server ordering, navigation, and server creation dialog.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog for first‑time profile setup allowing the user to enter and save a display name.
frontend/src/components/profile/RoleAssi: Dialog to assign or remove roles for a server member with pending‑state handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserProf: Full user profile overlay showing avatar, banner, details, roles, and role‑management options.
frontend/src/components/servers/CreateSe: Dialog for creating a new server with name and description fields and backend‑guard checks.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerIc: Displays a server icon image if available or a fallback with the server's initial.
frontend/src/components/settings/ServerS: Dialog for creating text or voice channels, handling form input, category selection, and mutation states.
Dialog allowing users to move a channel to another category with validation and pending state handling.
Panel for selecting a server member and managing their assigned roles with a role assignment dialog.
Fetches and displays audit log entries with formatted timestamps, event types, and user IDs.
Displays categories and channels with ordering controls, supports moving channels and creating new ones.
Form for viewing and updating basic server settings like description, media URLs, and community mode.
Allows selecting a server member and managing their assigned roles via a role management dialog.
Provides UI to create new roles and list existing ones, including color and permissions setup.
Provides the layout and navigation shell for server settings pages with a sidebar and dynamic content area.
frontend/src/components/settings/UserSet: Lets users adjust theme mode and text scaling preferences.
Manages updating user profile fields, avatar/banner URLs, and username.
Container for user settings pages with navigation, logout handling, and page rendering.
frontend/src/components/system/BackendCo: Displays backend connection status with loading, error guidance, and retry controls.
Displays a stage channel layout with hardcoded speakers and audience and a raise-hand button.
Manages voice channel connection state, renders participants, and provides controls for joining, leaving, and muting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActionGuard: Provides a simple disabled/reason status based on backend connection state.
Tracks backend readiness using useSafeActor and a lightweight health check and exposes connection status and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for authentication, identity loading, login, and logout state.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsMobile.ts: Returns a boolean indicating if the viewport width is below a given breakpoint.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogout.ts: Logs the user out and clears React Query cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines numerous backend query and mutation hooks for profiles, usernames, server data, messages, and voice presence with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Initializes an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with retries and validation, exposing its state and errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light and dark modes, and global styles including focus and transition utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Implements a signup/signin UI with form validation and authentication handling using useAuth.
frontend/src/state/navigation.ts: Provides context and state management for app navigation, selected server/channel, and settings visibility.
frontend/src/state/notifications.ts: Manages notification override settings in localStorage and helpers to check server or channel mute status.
frontend/src/state/settings.ts: Stores user settings such as theme, accent color, notifications, and keybinds with persistence to localStorage.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Defines extended TypeScript interfaces for backend entities like servers, channels, roles, and audit logs.
frontend/src/utils/channelOrdering.ts: Utilities to apply and build channel and category ordering based on persisted ServerOrdering data.
frontend/src/utils/hideElementByXPath.ts: Provides functions to remove a DOM element by XPath and set up a MutationObserver for continuous removal.
frontend/src/utils/roleColor.ts: Provides utilities to sanitize hex color strings and compute lightness or contrast colors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout that rejects if it does not resolve in time.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing current issues, feature requests, and registration error investigation.
